title: Practitioner Competency Development Course for Coaching Culture Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental organizational development and leadership concepts
context.additional_context: A foundational design competency development program for novice practitioners who recognize the need to establish a coaching culture within organizations, emphasizing practical understanding through discussions and case analyses.

learning_goals: Explain the core components of a coaching culture (leader motivation, relationship management, role modeling).
Apply a 3-stage framework for designing a coaching culture within an organization in practical settings.
Analyze real-world cases to identify barriers to a coaching culture and derive resolution strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
